author: CTPPS
body:
#### PR description:

This is a cosmetic PR to make the scoring planes used in PPS simulation consistent with the RP geometry. The maximum correction is 1 mm. Combined with the small angles (wrt. beam) of the forward protons, the effect on the simulated hits is on the micron level, thus negligible. Details are attached here: [kaspar_PPS_scoring_planes.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/7082244/kaspar_PPS_scoring_planes.pdf)


#### PR validation:

The plots below show comparisons before (blue) and after this PR (red dashed):
  * Run2 data reco workflow:  [reco_cmp.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/7082262/reco_cmp.pdf) - no difference observed, as strictly expected
  * "direct simulation" workflow: [dirsim_cmp.pdf](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/7082267/dirsim_cmp.pdf) - no difference observed, as expected due the tiny change
title: PPS: update scoring plane z positions
